q: The judges aren't desperately trying to fill a premade roles and I find myself agreeing with them more often than not. JEANNE DEPAUL: I wasn't going to watch Wednesday evening either, Susie. They won't pull me in again; I will watch when I want to, not when THEY decide I should. I'll record it and watch it Thursday... or maybe even Friday. But I am a child of the TV generation. Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama .`` He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible Bill Clintonial candidate himself.
